properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Patapsco River including Baltimore Harbor; Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 20 at 2:54AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
Strong northwest winds will cause water levels to be near or lower
than one foot below mean lower low water along the western shore
of the Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to North Beach around
low tide this morning. Low tide at Annapolis will be 6:53 AM and
8:37 AM at Baltimore Fort McHenry.

Mariners should check navigation charts to avoid grounding their
vessel, particularly when boating away from the main channel.
